name: Importance of Exhanging Gifts
description:
“Shared joy is a double joy; shared sorrow is half sorrow”. No matter whether it is in good times or bad times; sharing gifts has a profound effect in the lives of the people. It becomes a way of sharing happiness and joy at the good moments and also at the same time can be comforting in times of sadness or sickness. Develop the habit of exchanging gifts with your family members, friends and relatives which is a key to long term happiness and maintain the bond. But, before gifting to someone special, there are few things to keep in mind. This article provides a quick guide to understand the importance of exchanging gifts. 

https://www.realflowers.ae/blog/exchanging-gifts-among-friends-and-relatives/
